report.title: My Body is 500 Years Old
report.author: Lp
report.bodytext: My god, I write this as I am experiencing one of the worst things ever. Sinicuichi, don't do it. I seems like 3 or 4 other people had the same report I'm going to give. I am SORE. My entire body aches. My fingers hurt as I type this. It is about 1.5 hours after ingestion. I have ingested about a spoonful of goop that was the result of boiling down 1 ounce of Sinicuichi leaves. There was a slight stoney feeling between the naseau and intense (And I MEAN INTENSE) muscle soreness. I hope my heart hangs on, as it's a muscle. /n /n NOT WORTH IT.
